text: Muhammad ibn Ibrahim ibn Abd al-Latif ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn Hassan ibn Muhammad ibn Abd al-Wahhab Al ash-Sheikh Al Tamimi (1893-1989) was an Islamic scholar and former Grand Mufti of Saudi Arabia. He served as Grand Mufti from 1953 until his death in 1989. He was considered a respected scholar during the reigns of three successive kings of Saudi Arabia. == Other websites == Category:1890 births Category:1969 deaths Category:Grand Muftis of Saudi Arabia == Reference ==
title: Muhammad ibn Ibrahim Al ash-Sheikh
